page.title: 04SCHOOL SECRETARY
page.content: Mrs.M.Stafford has been the secretary at Geddington CofE Primary School since 1966. She lives in the village and cycles to work arriving promptly at 10am every day. She begins by stacking 60 sandwich boxes neatly on an old wooden trolley, washing the tea mugs and preparing the filtre coffee ready for playtime at 10.45am. She then begins her clerical duties by checking the dinner registers and phoning the number of meals required through to Grange School Canteen, Kettering. The paperwork remains to be dealt with. At lunchtimes, she supervises the dinner children until 1.15pm when school begins. She continues with her duties until 2pm, when she cycles back home.
